title: Bulletstorm logo Font

comments.content: I think this is based on the free font **[Kroftsmann](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317121037/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=Kroftsmann%20-%20Regular&fid=3b0ed1e1efab0bca2936aa1db1ff4f33&fsize=60&text=BULLETSTORM&fit=1)**
